name: Std-5(2) MCQs Gujarat
description: Pankajsid34 presents the Gujarati Quiz android app for all Subjects of Std.-5 Second Sem. NCERT based New Math. Subject is also added. Star Features of the app are given below.   Features :- - Simple GUI & great look. - This is an online android app with low size up to 3.5 mb only. - You can play chapter wise quiz of all Subjects of class 5 Second sem. - There are 730+ MCQ questions included in this game. - And more Questions will be added in Future, without App Update.... - You can see right answer at the same time with know answer button if your answer is wrong. - See overview, Result and Response with Grade for all questions you Play at the end of the quiz. - There is not any disturbance of Advertisement in this app. - This is very useful app for Primary School Students & Teachers also. - Useful for Competitive & Scholarship exams... - This App can be used for Exercise, Evaluation & also for Remedial work.  Your mobile must be Gujarati Supported for this app and keep your Mobiles Font Size normal for best view. Minimum Requirement: - 1 GB RAM and 100 kbps internet speed and 5 inch or bigger Screen Size Minimum Android Version: - Android 5.0 L  Visit our website for more Educational Materials. Links are given below.
